description: Marine Resources and Environment from China University of Geosciences is the main direction of Marine resources and environment which focuses on fostering high-level special talents.

The objective of the Food Science and Engineering at Jiangsu University is to develop within the student an understanding of the nature, properties, and characteristics of foods as determined through biochemistry, chemistry, microbiology, physics, statistics and nutrition.

The BEng Architectural Engineering programme at Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University is is designed to produce architectural engineers with strong problem-solving skills and a comprehensive understanding of the multidisciplinary aspects of building.

The Financial Mathematics (Hons) programme at Beijing Normal University - Hong Kong Baptist University United International College aims to equip our graduates with the skills needed for doing comprehensive quantitative analysis of financial products, financial institutions and markets.

The Computer Science and Technology (Hons) programme at Beijing Normal University - Hong Kong Baptist University United International College aims to prepare students for a career in computer science or in information-technology related areas.
institute: Beijing Normal University - Hong Kong Baptist University United International College

The Globalisation and Development (Honours) programme at Beijing Normal University - Hong Kong Baptist University United International College is a uniquely relevant and comprehensive platform where international  affairs and STEM studies converge.
